basics.name: Coffee the Dog
basics.label: Energetic Companion | Squirrel Surveillance Specialist | Snack Enthusiast
basics.summary: Loyal and enthusiastic 4-year-old Australian Shepherd with a proven track record in companionship, high-speed yard patrol, and advanced listening skills. Known for high energy, a friendly demeanor, and being the first to greet guests at the door. Seeking new opportunities to chase tennis balls, herd small humans, or simply be a very good dog.

work.name: Home Headquarters
work.summary: Maintains vigilant presence on furniture, ensuring no crumbs are left uneaten. Specializes in detecting incoming delivery trucks before they even arrive. Provides emotional support and warmth during Netflix marathons.

work.name: Backyard Operations Unit
work.summary: Successfully barked away over 200 squirrels, birds, and suspicious leaves. Demonstrates tireless commitment to patrolling perimeter at all hours. Maintains excellent situational awareness and quick reaction time.

work.name: Evening Exercise Program
work.summary: Leads daily bursts of energy around the house or backyard. Promotes family exercise and laughter through spontaneous sprints.

skills.name: Master of tail wags and cuddles
